des:
Connect Alexa with your Centero Home System and control your Smarthome devices with your voice.
With this skill, your smart devices can be controlled using voice commands.
 
Requirements for operation with Centero Home:
- Centero Home Gateway V5 or V6
- Centero Home Plus (Chargeable/ In-App)
 
Examples of voice commands: (Subject to change)
 
Light: (Philips Hue)
- Alexa, turn on living room ceiling lamp
 
Shading: (elero)
- Alexa, increase living room shutters
- Alexa, decrease living room shutters
 
Heating: (Homematic)
- Alexa, set living room heater to 23 degrees
 
Macro / Scene: (Various)
- Alexa, turn on movie night
